title: @riot, need 2 rp
body: i need 2 rp for buying hextech key, could you give it to me? thanks

replies.body: I can't really do much for this on the boards, but you should reach out to our [**support staff**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in a ticket and see what they think about your request ^_^!
I remember emailing them one of my drawings and asked for 15rp they actually gave me it :D
